author: Uno Platform
name: Uno Platform App
description: Solution template for creating a multi-platform C# & XAML application targeting Android, iOS, WebAssembly, Skia Desktop Windows, macOS, Linux (X11/Framebuffer) and Windows App SDK.

preset.description: Selects whether to use the recommended or blank app defaults for the template

choices.description: Recommended set of options to create a production-ready app targeting multiple platforms
Smallest set of options, with no extra dependencies, to create an app targeting multiple platforms

publisher.description: This sets the Identity Publisher of the Package.appxmanifest file. This should match the subject of the signing certificate and will be used for the default development certificate. (e.g. O=Uno Platform)

tfm.description: Select the .NET version of your solution

architecture.description: Select the design pattern for your application

choices.description: Use the Model-View-Update eXtended (MVUX) design pattern

markup.description: How would you like to code your UI

choices.description: Use C# Markup for the UI

appTheme.description: Selects the theme design system for the application.

platforms.description: What platforms would you like to target

choices.description: Enables Skia Desktop Windows, macOS, Linux (X11/Framebuffer)
Enables the Windows target platform using WinAppSDK (WinUI 3)
Include a project for authoring traditional unit tests
Include a project for authoring UI tests using the Uno.UITest framework

cases.condition: (tfm == 'net9.0')
(tfm == 'net9.0')
(preset == 'recommended')
(preset == 'blank')

renderer.description: Controls the renderer used for iOS, Android, and WebAssembly targets

choices.description: Use Skia based rendering for mobile and web

server.description: Includes a Server project for an API & host for the WebAssembly project

toolkit.description: Includes Uno.Toolkit for additional controls and helper classes

dependencyInjection.description: Use dependency injection for registering and accessing services

http.description: Configure HTTP support in the application

choices.description: Enable configuration of native HTTP handlers and registration of basic endpoints

localization.description: Configures support for localizing resources throughout the application

logging.description: Configures logging support in the application

choices.description: Debug Logging for the Application Framework to the Console
Logging is accessible via dependency injection and writes output to Console
Logging is accessible via dependency injection and uses Serilog
Uses Uno.Extensions.Navigation to navigate using regions
Provides Blank App experience with default WinUI Frame Navigation

authentication.description: Configures authentication support in the application

choices.description: Application uses custom logic to authenticate user
Application uses MSAL to authenticate user
Application uses OpenID Connect to authenticate user
Application uses web based authentication to authenticate user

themeService.description: Include theme service for switching between Dark, Light and System themes

cases.condition: (preset == 'recommended')
(preset == 'blank')

dspGenerator.description: Import a Uno DSP theme file to override Material colors

cases.condition: (preset == 'recommended')
(preset == 'blank')

continuousIntegration.description: Configures continuous integration support for the solution

choices.description: Continuous integration files generated for Azure Pipelines
Continuous integration files generated for GitHub Actions

defaultBranchName.description: The name of the default branch for the repository

vscode.description: Sets up Visual Studio Code Debugging for WebAssembly and Skia Desktop

rider.description: Sets up Rider support for the solution

wasmPwaManifest.description: Includes a manifest in the WebAssembly project to make the application a PWA

mauiEmbedding.description: Configures application to embed .NET MAUI controls

wasmMultiThreading.description: Configures application to use multi-threading in WebAssembly

mediaElement.description: Configures application to bundle native assets required for the MediaPlayerElement

skipRestore.description: If specified, skips the automatic restore of the project on create.
